name: Cowboy Revenge-Wild Horse Guns
description:
Cowboy Revenge-Wild Horse Guns is not a simple rodeo adventure game in which you have to look after ranch or to maintain the stable. In this western cowboy game, you have to take revenge of your beloved wife from the lawless posse. You have to train yourself for horse racing, gun shooting and arrow archery shooting for taking the revenge of your wife from western bloody goons.

This American cowboy game is based on the story impeccable cowboy who never hurt anyone. He always remains busy in his horse stable. Once on a normal fine day, he was busy like all other cowboys schedule. Suddenly he saw smoke on the horizon raising from his home and found his horse coming towards him wildly. He realized that something bad had happened to his lovely beautiful wife. He rides on his horse and runs towards his home wildly. But it was too late. He could only see his home burning in front of his eyes but he could do nothing. His wife has been murdered by the six western gangsters. A gang of US gunfighter shot his wife and burnt their home.

One that day he decided to become a cowboy fighter shooter to take the revenge of his wife. A revenge wrote in blood and be best of all legends. He promised to himself for killing all the wildest cowboy fighters and west gangsters for the revenge of his beloved wife. After that, he carried the cowboy gun and started the new mission of his life, unlike other cowboys game.

So in this western game, you have to play as the west cowboy for training yourself. Start learning from horse riding in extremely worst situations, try to become a professional and experienced horse rider. Ride your horse across different hurdles and obstacles and perform different horse stunts for training yourself. After horse riding training, start cowboy archery training by aiming bull eye boards. Cowboy archery training would help you to fight against gangsters and western goons. After archery training, you would be trained for cowboy shooting and cowboy fighting because enemies and west gangsters may be equipped with latest weapons so you should also be trained for fighting in any condition. In one mission you would be trained to shoot while running or hiding behind the walls and later missions you would be trained with shooting skill while riding your horse at maximum speed.

So this is the time to start cowboy adventure by riding the wild horse and by hunting gunfighters of the western world. There are multiple challenging missions of bounty hunting. Be the cowboy hero hunter and demolish the wrath of western mafia gangsters. Such cowboy games demand extraordinary skills of cowboy shooting, cowboy archery and you should be highly trained horse rider for fighting against west gunfighters. Explore the town by riding your racing horse and search the gangsters for killing them on the spot.

*** Features of Cowboy Revenge-Wild Horse Guns ***
- realistic countryside environment
- real animation of cowboys and horses
- real story base game
- HD graphics
- compatible with the variety of devices
- real physics-based controls of cowboy horse
- contains real cowboy gun and sword
- one of best cowboy games

It’s time to play cowboy games with horses and guns on your devices. Stop searching ordinary cowboy shooting games.
